descriptions:
Product Name: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work

Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest, your ultimate cushioning companion for a comfortable and healthy work experience! This versatile foot rest is designed to provide optimal support and relaxation, whether you're working at the office, using it in your car, or even on an airplane.

The BlissTrends Foot Rest is crafted from high-quality foam, covered with a durable fabric that can withstand daily use. The black color adds a touch of elegance to its design. With dimensions of 16.9 inches in length, 11.2 inches in width, and 2.0 inches in height for the lower layer, and a thickness of 3.7 inches for the upper layer, this foot rest offers ample space for your feet and knees.

One of the standout features of the BlissTrends Foot Rest is its adjustable height. This allows you to customize the foot rest to your comfort, thanks to the magic tapes and zipper mechanism. The cover is also removable via a zipper and is machine washable, making maintenance a breeze.

The foot rest is designed with a non-slip bottom to ensure it stays in place no matter where you use it. Its ergonomic design supports correct sitting habits and relieves discomfort, making it suitable for use under your feet or behind your knees. It also provides relief for back, lumbar, and knee pain.

Experience the comfort and support of the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work. Order yours today and make your workday more comfortable!
